snippet: A specialist in restoration, he chronicled and furthered the row-house revival that transformed many New York neighborhoods.
abstract: Charles Lockwood, specialist in brownstone restoration and chronicler of New York row-house revival, dies at age 63.
lead_paragraph: A specialist in restoration, he chronicled and furthered the row-house revival that transformed many New York neighborhoods.

headline.seo: Charles Lockwood, Architectural Historian, Dies at 63
headline.main: Charles Lockwood, Who Wrote the Row-House Bible, Dies at 63
headline.print_headline: Charles Lockwood, 63; Wrote the Row-House Bible
